name: Turtles
ingredients: 2/3 tsp baking soda. 1 1/2 cups brown sugar, packed 1 cup chocolate chips.
steps: Mix flour, oats, soda, salt, brown sugar and margarine until crumbly. Put 1/2 mixture into an ungreased 9 x 13
baking pan. Bake at 35o for 10 minutes. Melt caramels and milk in saucepan. Sprinkle chocolate chips on top
of baked mixture. Drizzle caramel over top. Sprinkle reserved crumbs over all. Bake 15 minutes more.
